snippet: Iran will earn the respect of soccer fans around the world with its performance against Nigeria in their World Cup opener on Monday, according to the team's goalkeeping coach....

headline.print_headline: Pride at Stake for Iran at World Cup
headline.main: Pride at Stake for Iran at World Cup

lead_paragraph: Iran will earn the respect of soccer fans around the world with its performance against Nigeria in their World Cup opener on Monday, according to the team's goalkeeping coach.
